tweets.text:
Our fisheries enforcement officers have been on patrol with @WMPolice following reports of illegal fishing on Sutton Park pools.

Angler booked for out of season fishing on site of special scientific interest (SSSI)

The 🐟close season runs until 15 June - https://t.co/g1jlNXg6wG https://t.co/G3q0LV0uoR

@PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids 😳 Well that’s okay then... Can you define what is a  ‘small’ risk? Is it a 1%  becoming seriously ill? 10% chance? Small? 🤔@StinkStopthe #stopthestink @EnvAgency https://t.co/85pDJzHNRG

@SianieRoo @LoneRanger77777 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe 6am this morning. Driving through the Westlands and all the way through to the M6 jnct 15 it was horrendous. Unbearable stench.

Gassed by @RedIndustries2 
Gaslighted by the @EnvAgency & @PHE_EoEngland 

We will stand as a community and fight you with everything we’ve got. What you find is @RedIndustries2 that when you harm our children we have nothing to lose @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/E34PFX01VG

Wonder why you’re not taking core samples @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA ? Is that because if you don’t have any proof you don’t have to act? @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/ohKGHXr1Es

tweets.text:
Public Health England: “Based on the current data up to the end of March we would stress that any risk to long- term physical health is likely to be small, however we cannot completely exclude a risk to health from pollutants in the area.”

North Staffordshire Lives Don’t Matter

A real pleasure joining @goustocooking's Timo Boldt for his podcast, talking about my early experiences working with growing companies and sharing some of the investment lessons I’ve learned along the way. Listen here: https://t.co/UoeRTkNPJJ
@AJ_BELLAMY_ @EnvAgency @NESouthWest Because we all know how easy Cetti’s warbler nests are to find!
@WiseBirding @EnvAgency @NESouthWest What’s the rush - why not wait till September -??? False funding deadlines I assume - I hope there next finders are a skilled bunch

The Otter Estuary Restoration should be brilliant, but it is quickly becoming a disaster! Tree & vegetation cover removal from 4th May is appalling bad practice for nesting birds, regardless of dormice. Time to stop. @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice https://t.co/oTzDbjCBof

My kitchen, 2 miles away and up a hill from #WalleysQuarry, in Keele has suddenly been filled with the smell of landfill! @EnvAgencyMids sort it out! This is now a human rights issue! People can't enjoy their own homes. #StopTheStink
Beautiful morning on Bunny Hill - the Bluebells are fabulous. A beautiful fragrance although occasionally interspersed with The Stink sadly! 😍♥️ https://t.co/maUJ7YvW1O

tweets.text: @SianieRoo @poppers82 @fayedavies @LoneRanger77777 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off Too right , We can't let @RedIndustries2 win . perhaps @BorisJohnson should do one honourable thing in his life and end this misery for our borough of 100,000 people . He should also remember that this is for now (no offence @AaronBell4NUL you have done us proud ) a tory seat .

TREE & HEDGEROW REMOVAL STARTS 4th MAY. The problem is the scale & extent of habitat removal here: https://t.co/SdJh7fiEqd I know the site and there’s a lot! This should be a brilliant restoration project. Now a disaster! Appalling bad practice & agreed by @EnvAgency @NESouthWest https://t.co/mXD9wgJ1ZR

@Cap_it_off @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL The full details of the permit change which allowed the huge increase in waste needs to be analysed by the community. How did it come to this? Was it handled properly by @EnvAgency ? Did relevant people have opportunity to object? Did @RedIndustries2 use influence of Landfillfund

So @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA Please tell me, If I hit someone once a day and the pain of that assault is transient and brief, does it not count If I do it once a day, every day for a week, a month, a year, two years, three years?
#stopthestink

@davemh72 @poppers82 @fayedavies @LoneRanger77777 They’re definitely not listening, they have no interest in the environment or people - that’s abundantly clear. Not going to stop fighting it though, that’s what they want isn’t it? @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off #stopthestink
Landfill gases filling the house again last night. Everywhere stinks. Hubby woke up feeling dizzy. Usual reporting to Env Agency and Council. @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 EA this goes beyond a bit of tarp & a barrow full of soil, this is an environmental disaster on a catastrophic scale & needs addressing immediately as an emergency. This landfill is totally out of control & we are being systematically poisoned on a daily basis, close it down 😡

@Chris_Barlow10 @MonicaHone @RussellB1ggs @FriendsRib @AffinityWater @EnvAgency Not showing up on @AffinityWater works map which is a puzzle

Fishing this bank holiday weekend?

Even though it’s illegal to fish for course fish in rivers until 15th June inclusive, there are still plenty of places you can fish legally.

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 That’s got to be one magic layer of plastic and soil to substantially reduce these odours. It’s completely off the scale tonight. #stopthestink

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 You saying that you ‘saw progress today’ means nothing. The people of Newcastle under Lyme need to smell progress. No excuses, do your job and #StopTheStink

2/5 Our @EnvAgencyMids #enforcement notice requires the #landfill operator to cap parts of #WalleysQuarry by midnight 30/04/21. 

This is an important milestone but there will be more to do limit odour. 

I saw progress today 👇 and discussed next steps with @RedIndustries2 https://t.co/o3V9B20fdG

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA nice to see you take you own health and safety very serious by wearing an h2s monitor but what about the people of Newcastle under lyme you’ve made every excuse to keep that place open and please tell me why on earth you can’t just fill the remaining cells wit clay

tweets.text: It’s really quite unbelievable - shows how little the @EnvAgency care about people & the environment. That’s a direct cause of the strength of the fumes & the wider fumes. Think it’s time to crowd fund some damn good lawyers @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/xynL7kSiN4

4/5 We’ve been speaking regularly but it was good to meet up with @AaronBell4NUL today. 

@EnvAgencyMids primary focus for #WalleysQuarry is @RedIndustries2 reducing odour so I was able to reassure him on behalf of his constituents that’s our priority. https://t.co/1zieoKZPsc

@SianieRoo @ldmartens1 @BBCRadioStoke @SOPH_C_ @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe You are spot on with this, we need to keep the momentum going now that National Press are aware and covering. The authorisation by the @EnvAgency to allow 60% increase when they were already aware of odour problems was a disgrace & needs to be highlighted to the Press.

@ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 You could close it if you chose. RI are grossly incompetent & have no scruples. In order to wind the place down & in view of their mismanagement capping should be passed to a reputable operator. This should be the equivalent of putting a hospital or school into special measures

@StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency https://t.co/32aD8T1a7f https://t.co/78XBuIhDWm
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Try living here and asking no questions! It's mental and physical torture...I'm sure that it won't be long before someone snaps! Will you be ok with that?

https://t.co/AepnYD2UqD
I live a mile from the landfill site at #WalleysQuarry, & despite what @EnvAgencyMids & @PHE_uk would have you think, I can confirm that it absolutely chuffing stinks! 💩💩💩
Please help us to #StopTheStink

On 4th March 2020 the First-teir Tribunal overruled a decision by EA & ICO not to provide Robert Latimer with data regarding the Whitburn sewage overflow.

1 year, 1 month & 26 days later he has still not received that information.

Why is that @EnvAgency, @ICOnews? https://t.co/wO5G8OTvfh
@Chris_Barlow10 @RussellB1ggs @markwilkinson1 @FriendsRib @AffinityWater I've just written to @EnvAgency to find out. https://t.co/WFiHALB9Rx
@davemh72 @StinkStopthe @SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids of course they will, and the EA have let it get to this point ,to big to fail
@ChazzFunk @Thanet @filthythanet @VisitThanet @IsleThanetNews @ChazzFunk Hi, please could you DM us the address so we can get this logged with the team.

Things I thought I’d never tweet for the @EnvAgencyYNE ….

A friend got this clip of a deer swimming and wondering round the #RiverDon in #KelhamIsland, #Sheffield.

It’s really nice to see nature so close to urban centres….. it’s called @theoutdoorcity for a reason 🙌 https://t.co/caWjbvP2JT

The Darent is flowing freely again through the restored channel in Central Park, Dartford. 

The Grand Opening was a big day! Read all about it here: https://t.co/1LL3E5hsV3

Thanks to everyone who worked so hard on this project. @welovedartford @EnvAgencySE @VeoliaUK @cbecUK https://t.co/hIOLKjW3nL

Fabulous report on @itvnews about @RedIndustries2 and @WalleysL @EnvAgencyMids is it true you are not able to provide today’s report due to technical difficulties? Forgotten to turn the sensors on AGAIN? @itvnews perhaps you could ask them what tech.diffs mean?

@SilverdaleNorth @EnvAgencyMids Hi SilverdaleNorth, 2 reasons: i) it's best practice to regularly test the machines so they record to v high accuracy but this means raw data has to be processed & ii) we want you to have health advice alongside the data but to do this health experts need to see it first.

Not much difference noticed here !!
@EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/uAYXe3TlE0 https://t.co/pIFSobO3ai

So @RedIndustries2 you state that from your talks with the @EnvAgency that 'odours' have reduced (quoted from @ITVCentral tonight). This proves you to be the liars you are. Get out of our town you are not welcome @StinkStopthe https://t.co/T6EuwhIzsn

1/5 Really pleased to be out in #NewcastleunderLyme today with @EnvAgencyMids for a #CovidSafe visit to:
- see @RedIndustries2 progress at #WalleysQuarry
- hear from residents
- see our #airquality monitoring stations
- meet @AaronBell4NUL for an update
